user_data.target_needs: I wanted comfortable, reliable underwear that provides full coverage and does not show under clothing.
purchase_reason: I purchased these because I wanted comfortable underwear that wouldn't show under my clothes. The breathable cotton and the no-show design were key features that appealed to me, as I prefer a relaxed fit without tight support. The emphasis on comfort and the practical aspects of the product were significant factors in my decision.

I chose these because I appreciate the combination of soft cotton and a comfortable fit. The full coverage and pinch-free design were important to me, as I wanted something that would stay in place and not cause any discomfort. The positive reviews and my previous experiences with similar products influenced my decision.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that offer comfort, durability, and quality. I value items that are well-made and provide a good fit, as evidenced by my positive experiences with socks, shoes, and clothing that emphasize comfort and support. I appreciate features like soft materials, good arch support, and breathable fabrics that enhance my overall experience. Additionally, I tend to favor products that are easy to care for and maintain their quality over time. On the other hand, I dislike items that do not fit properly, especially those that run small or are uncomfortable to wear. I also find poor quality or lack of durability unappealing, as I prefer to invest in products that will last and provide good value for money.

conversation.content: I want to find comfortable and reliable underwear that offers full coverage and doesn't show under clothing. within my expected price range: [8.46, 10.47]

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <Bali Women's Comfort Revolution Seamless Hi-Cut> / Item ID: B08YXC41MD / Price: $8.66 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ['A no-ride-up design, Bali® women’s Comfort Revolution® hi-cut panty is made for the woman on-the-go. Designed with Cool Comfort® moisture-wicking nylon fabric, this women’s panty will keep you comfortable all-day long. The high-cut, seamless panty features a tag-free design that won’t chafe or dig. Narrow leg bands and a knit-in waistband help minimize panty lines for a smooth finish. A classic high-rise design, Bali® seamless women’s underwear offers full front and back coverage so you can move with confidence.'] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Vanity Fair Women's Flattering Lace Hi Cut Panty> / Item ID: B00PRQH64A / Price: $8.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ['Flattering Lace Hi-Cut is made with ultra soft fabric that has an amazing stretch to adjust perfectly to your body. Lace waist and leg elastic offer a stylish look while staying in place.'] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <Vanity Fair Women's Smoothing Comfort Brief Panties with Rear Lift> / Item ID: B086WMTRXP / Price: $7.95 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ['A little smoothing and a little lift, the Vanity Fair Smoothing Comfort Lace Brief is comfortable enough to wear all day. This panty gently smooths your silhouette with a special reinforced panel to provide extra tummy smoothing. The soft lace pattern on the front adds pretty detail. Plus, the unique back gives you extra definition and lift.']
